title: Mini games, a new racing scoring system, and more are coming to Zwift Fall 2023
content:
Incoming updates to the most popular indoor training program available include Watopia, Climb Portal, new Zwift Racing scoring, and more.

Read the full article at Mini games, a new racing scoring system, and more are coming to Zwift Fall 2023 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
